revised_title: Anatomy and Development of the Frog's Skull
tldr: The author examines the structure and development of the frog's skull, focusing on the morphology of the facial arches and the ossification process. The study provides insights into the distinction between exoskeleton and endoskeleton in the frog's skull and the role of fibrous bones in its development.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Vertebrate Anatomy
